label12: Records HD 1280 x 720 resolution at 30p and 480/60p video
label13: The Time Lapse recording feature takes still frames at preset intervals and them automatically creates a video file that condenses hours of recording into minutes of viewing
productfeatures: Built-in Microphone, Face Detection, High Definition, Image Stabilization
label14: With the Record Pause feature, you can pause the recording and then pick up right where you left off without creating a new file. This way you only have one file to work with and don't have to merge files for editing, sharing or transferring
label15: One touch sharing button to quickly upload your videos
dimensions: 2.2 inches high x 2.1 inches wide x 4.6 inches deep
power: Rechargeable battery pack and USB charging method
label1: You can also playback recorded clips and view them on the LCD display
label5: A fast maximum aperture of f/1.8
display: Articulated wide 2.7-inch 230k dot LCD display lets you see images on the screen clearly while you shoot, even when youre looking from the side, above or below
